testsuite.name: newpackage.Myclass
testsuite.system-out: Location is verified in the filters area Checkin and Checkout dates are verified in the filters area Guests count are verified in the filters area Data in the header are verified successfully
the properties displayed on the first page can accommodate at least the selected number of guests.
he properties displayed on the first page have at least the number of selected bedrooms. The first property has a pool

the property is displayed on the map and the color of the pin changes (upon hover) A pop up is displayed with the property data the details shown in the map popup are the same as the ones shown in the search results
